channel.title: Server wont connect?!?!
channel.description:
Well, when before i start up my server i check my no-ip ihave that updated and its running then i check to make sure i have a good client then i start up the server by using the runserver.bat file when i go to login to my server it doesnt connect?
I Set Envirement Variables, I have a working no-ip. I dont know if i did the port fowarding right but i went to my port fowarding thing with 192.168.0.1 like usually put in my pass and what not then i did this:
Im using a netgear fyi: I Clicked on portfowarding on the side there was 1 column the top is the one i made before;
[IMG]http://i144.photobucket.com/albums/r163/Xtreme29/untitled-4.jpg[/img]
thats what my portfowarding thing looks like.
and here is what my problem is soz...
[IMG]http://i144.photobucket.com/albums/r163/Xtreme29/untitled-2.jpg[/img]
PLEASE TELL ME IF YOU COULD HELP! I REALLY NEED IT IVE BEEN TRYING TO FIX THE PROLEM FOR ABOUT 1 MONTH NOW SOZ...

item.title: Server wont connect?!?!
item.dc:creator: @FusionLord FusionLord
item.description:
@FusionLord wrote:

yeah in you server source look inside server.java and search for serverlistenerPort and change the port to yours then search for connectingHost and change the host to epicscape.myvnc.com
if that doesn’t work duplacte the port as java.exe

Read full topic

item.title: Server wont connect?!?!
item.dc:creator: @supra_s supra s
item.description:
@supra_s wrote:

u need to change it in your client it self

search for EGUI.class

look for client.main(new String[] {

change the 3 ip’s to your ip (3times)

save , compile , it should work now

supra ~

Read full topic
